Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at Woodlawn/93rd
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove and resume regular route: due to, street blockage near Woodlawn/93rd.

Headline: #147 Outer Drive Express Temporary Reroute at Morse/Sheridan
ShortDescription: #147 Outer Drive Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Sheridan, Morse, Ashland, Pratt and Sheridan, then resume over their normal route

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#147 Outer Drive Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Sheridan, Morse, Ashland, Pratt and Sheridan, then resume over their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to police activity near Morse/Sheridan.
